about_the_game:
An action-platformer like no other

The ball is physics-based, and your character has tight controls. The clash between the unpredictability of the ball and the precision of the player, is what makes every play session unique.

Your goals vary between taking the ball to a goal, smashing enemies with it, breaking blocks, and much more! Can you master this challenge?

Features:

  • Quick levels that allow you to better manage your play time.

  • Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay

  • Fun, optional character dialogue

  • Level up system that unlocks new challenges and worlds

  • Highscores keep the replayability high

Varied game modes for a diversified experience

  • Reach the goal

  • Whack'a'Mole

  • Break the blocks

Help Sona achieve her dream of becoming a pro Cyber Volley athlete!

This young girl wants to become a star of the most popular sport in the near future: Cyber Volley! Its up to you to win each challenge to make her shine!

name: Cyber Volley Demo
short_description: Volleyball has evolved! Smash the cyber volleyball onto enemies and bounce it around levels to collect points. This unique platformer is all about combining strategy with fast reflexes to obtain high scores. Keep the ball in the air, or you might lose. Help Sona to become a superstar!
